item.title: Test Soti
item.description: Testing Schema Query #textarea_repl_897 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 80px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (a)-[to]-(b) return * Limit 10 Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_897() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_897').val() neo.run_query(cypher) } function afterLoad() { if ('yes'==='yes') run_Query_repl_897() } function get_Query_from_Url() { $.

item.title: Control Neo4j
item.description: Multiple queries for the api (make sure you are on http;//localhost:3000) Neo4J queries match (n) return n match (n:Movie) return n create node create nodes for issue (GDPR-223) create nodes for issue (RISK-1092) create nodes using regex (GDPR-22) Data setup delete all nodes create all GDPR create all RISK Jira data all ids id:files RISK-1 Fields Schema

item.title: Debug Cypher query
item.description: This view can be used to see what data is received from Neo4J and how they are transformed into visjs objects Query #textarea_repl_530 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 35px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (a)-[to:relates_to]-(b) return * Limit 2 Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_530() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_530').
